con:restRequest.name: AddProgramOffer
con:restRequest.con:request: { "OfferCode": "${#TestCase#OfferName}", "ProgramCode": "PP", "OfferDescription": "${#TestCase#OfferName}", "OfferStartDate": "${StartDate#result}", "OfferEndDate": "${EndDate#result}", "OfferShortDescription": "Test offer short desc", "IsDefaultOffer": false, "IsEligibleOffer": true, "OptInRequired": true, "OfferName": "${#TestCase#OfferName}", "OfferTermsAndConditions": "This is a terms and condition for program sys offer", "Status": "A" }

con:restRequest.name: UpdateProgramOffer
con:restRequest.con:request: { "OfferCode": "${#TestCase#OfferName}", "ProgramCode": "PP", "OfferDescription": "${#TestCase#OfferName}", "OfferStartDate": "${StartDate#result}", "OfferEndDate": "${EndDate#result}", "OfferShortDescription": "Test offer short desc", "IsDefaultOffer": false, "IsEligibleOffer": true, "IsCouponOffer" : false, "OptInRequired": true, "OfferName": "${#TestCase#OfferName}", "OfferTermsAndConditions": "This is a terms and condition for program sys offer", "Status": "A" }
